snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Monday, selections include the chairman of Google in North Korea, a theory about some effects of online dating and Samsung advertising on...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Monday, selections include the chairman of Google in North Korea, a theory about some effects of online dating and Samsung advertising on The Associated Press's main Twitter account during the Consumer Electronics Show.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Game Wreckers and a Changing C.E.S.
